title: Ulf Norinder: the larger-than-life privateer
summary: Born into wealth, Ulf Norinder, right, raced a Maserati 200S and Porsche 718 in his twenties when he befriended compatriot Jo Bonnier. In the 1960s, despite his size, he campaigned…

qa_pairs.question: Which car manufacturer did Ulf Norinder race with in his twenties?
Who was Ulf Norinder's compatriot and friend in racing?
In which decade did Ulf Norinder actively campaign in racing despite his size?
